mapper.sql: FILE_ID , FILE_TYPE, FILE_PURPOSE, FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_BUCKET_NAME, FILE_BUCKET_OBJECT, FILE_SIZE, FILE_EXTENTION, FILE_URL, FILE_SORT, FILE_IS_MAIN, FILE_REMARK, STATUS, OPTION01, OPTION02, OPTION03, OPTION04, OPTION05, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into TB_FILE_LIST (FILE_ID, FILE_TYPE, FILE_PURPOSE, FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_BUCKET_NAME, FILE_BUCKET_OBJECT, FILE_SIZE, FILE_EXTENTION, FILE_URL, FILE_SORT, FILE_IS_MAIN, FILE_REMARK, STATUS, OPTION01, OPTION02, OPTION03, OPTION04, OPTION05, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePurpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileOriginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileBucketName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileBucketObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileExtention,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileIsMain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into TB_FILE_LIST
FILE_ID,
FILE_TYPE,
FILE_PURPOSE,
FILE_ORIGIN_NAME,
FILE_NAME,
FILE_PATH,
FILE_BUCKET_NAME,
FILE_BUCKET_OBJECT,
FILE_SIZE,
FILE_EXTENTION,
FILE_URL,
FILE_SORT,
FILE_IS_MAIN,
FILE_REMARK,
STATUS,
OPTION01,
OPTION02,
OPTION03,
OPTION04,
OPTION05,
CREATE_TIME

mapper.update:
update TB_FILE_LIST
FILE_TYPE = #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_PURPOSE = #{filePurpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_ORIGIN_NAME = #{fileOriginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_PATH = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_BUCKET_NAME = #{fileBucketName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_BUCKET_OBJECT = #{fileBucketObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_SIZE = #{fileSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_EXTENTION = #{fileExtention,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_URL = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_SORT = #{fileSort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FILE_IS_MAIN = #{fileIsMain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_REMARK = #{fileRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION01 = #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION02 = #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION03 = #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION04 = #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION05 = #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = NOW()
where FILE_ID = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update TB_FILE_LIST set FILE_TYPE = #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_PURPOSE = #{filePurpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_ORIGIN_NAME = #{fileOriginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_PATH = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_BUCKET_NAME = #{fileBucketName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_BUCKET_OBJECT = #{fileBucketObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_SIZE = #{fileSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_EXTENTION = #{fileExtention,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_URL = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_SORT = #{fileSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FILE_IS_MAIN = #{fileIsMain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_REMARK = #{fileRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION01 = #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION02 = #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION03 = #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION04 = #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION05 = #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where FILE_ID = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT T1.FILE_ID ,T1.FILE_TYPE ,T1.FILE_PURPOSE ,T1.FILE_ORIGIN_NAME ,T1.FILE_NAME ,T1.FILE_PATH ,T1.FILE_BUCKET_NAME ,T1.FILE_BUCKET_OBJECT ,T1.FILE_SIZE ,T1.FILE_EXTENTION ,T1.FILE_URL ,T1.FILE_SORT ,T1.FILE_IS_MAIN ,T1.FILE_REMARK ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_FILE_LIST T1 ORDER BY T1.CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT T1.FILE_ID ,T1.FILE_TYPE ,T1.FILE_PURPOSE ,T1.FILE_ORIGIN_NAME ,T1.FILE_NAME ,T1.FILE_PATH ,T1.FILE_BUCKET_NAME ,T1.FILE_BUCKET_OBJECT ,T1.FILE_SIZE ,T1.FILE_EXTENTION ,T1.FILE_URL ,T1.FILE_SORT ,T1.FILE_IS_MAIN ,T1.FILE_REMARK ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_FILE_LIST T1 WHERE T1.FILE_ID = #{fileId}
